sections.heading: This Act shall be known and may be cited as the Experimental Cancer Treatment Act.
sections.text: This Act shall be known and may be cited as the Experimental Cancer Treatment Act.

sections.heading: For the purposes of this Act, unless the context otherwise
sections.text: requires, the terms used in this Act shall have the following meanings ascribed to them:

sections.heading: The Department shall establish by rule a procedure for the
sections.text:
dissemination of information concerning cancer treatment and may act as
a clearinghouse for cancer treatment related materials. The Department
may make referrals to appropriate agencies or entities for services relating
to cancer treatment.

sections.heading: (a) No person shall undertake to treat cancer unless such person
sections.text:
is licensed under the Medical Practice Act of 1987 to practice medicine
in all of its branches or is licensed under The Dental Practice Act to
practice dentistry or is licensed under the Podiatric Medical Practice
Act of 1987 to
practice podiatric medicine.

sections.heading: Nothing in this Act shall be construed to relieve any person
sections.text:
from any requirement prescribed by or under authority of law with respect
to cancer treatments now included or which may hereafter be included within
the classifications of cancer treatments as defined in the applicable federal
and State laws relating to cancer treatments.
